TextView.android:text: Information technologies have played a critical and significant role in enhancing healthcare practices,this is through online health related discussions. Despite massive progress in healthcare informatics research and practice,confidentiality of data is still a big problem since many patients especially among HIV/AIDs patients think that their information might be disclosed to social media
